data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the state of Northern Ireland, United Kingdom need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Northern Ireland, United Kingdom
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Lord, there are 906,403 people in the state of Northern Ireland who claim Christianity, but may have never read the Bible. Please challenge them today to read the Bible for themselves.
data.verse: All Scripture is God-breathed and is useful for teaching, rebuking, correcting and training in righteousness

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, fill the 141,283 believers in the state of Northern Ireland with tears, because God is not obeyed by those around them.
data.verse: Streams of tears flow from my eyes, for your law is not obeyed.

data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the state of Northern Ireland unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

Father, I pray against the principalities, against the powers, against the world’s rulers of darkness of this age, and against the spiritual forces of the wickedness in the heavenly places that are warring against the Arab, Yemeni people.
Father, reveal your kingdom to those with a childlike heart in the state of Northern Ireland.
data.verse: At that time, Jesus answered, “I thank you, Father, Lord of heaven and earth, that you hid these things from the wise and understanding, and revealed them to infants. Yes, Father, for so it was well-pleasing in your sight.

data.prayer: Spirit, sanctify the 141,283 believers in Northern Ireland and keep them blameless until Jesus returns.
data.verse: May the God of peace himself sanctify you completely. May your whole spirit, soul, and body be preserved blameless at the coming of our Lord Jesus Christ. He who calls you is faithful, who will also do it.

data.section_summary:
the state of Northern Ireland, United Kingdom has a population of 1,862,100.

We estimate Northern Ireland has 141,283 people who might know Jesus, 906,403 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 814,414 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 141,283 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.
